title: BrainStuff Classics: Why Does Skin Tan and Freckle?
itunes:title: BrainStuff Classics: Why Does Skin Tan and Freckle?
description:
When you freckle or tan, your skin is trying to protect you from damage. Learn how it works in this episode of BrainStuff.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
